member.name: T:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.CultureInfo_PlatformSafe
member.summary: Some parts of CultureInfo are not compatible with some platforms. This class offers alternatives.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.CultureInfo_PlatformSafe.GetCultureInfo(System.String)
member.summary: CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo is not supported on Windows Phone 8. Use 'new CultureInfo(string)' as an alternative or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.Encoding_PlatformSafe.GetString_PlatformSafe(System.Text.Encoding,System.Byte[])
member.summary: The overload with only byte[] does not work on Windows Phone 8.

member.name: T:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper
member.summary: This class provides various alternatives to parts of .NET that do not work on certain platforms. It exists as a helper to get immediate overview over various platform compatibility issues. It also exists as extension methods that become visible in intellisense if you try to access a platform-unsafe member.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.MemberInfo_MemberType_PlatformSafe(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Windows Phone / Unity compatibility: Don't switch on MemberInfo.MemberType. It produced a strange exception when deployed to Windows Phone using Unity: "Method not found: 'System.Reflection.MemberTypes". Use 'is PropertyInfo' and such or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.CultureInfo_GetCultureInfo_PlatformSafe(System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(string name) is not supported on Windows Phone 8. Use 'new CultureInfo(string name)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.Type_GetInterface_PlatformSafe(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: Type.GetInterface(string name) is not supported on Windows Phone 8. Use the overload 'Type.GetInterface(string name, bool ignoreCase)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.XDocument_Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: XDocument.Save(string fileName) does not exist on Windows Phone 8. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead. Beware that this overload simply saves the root node and does not the features unique to XDocument.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.XElement_Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: XElement.Save(string fileName) does not exist on Windows Phone 8. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.XElement_Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: XElement.Save(Stream) exists on Windows Phone 8, but not in .NET 3.5. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformHelper.PropertyInfo_GetValue_PlatformSafe(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: iOS compatibility: PropertyInfo.GetValue in Mono on a generic type may cause JIT compilation, which is not supported by iOS. Use 'PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod().Invoke(object obj, params object[] parameters)' or call this method instead.

member.name: T:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions
member.summary: This class provides various alternatives to parts of .NET that do not work on certain platforms. It exists as extension methods that become visible in intellisense if you try to access a platform-unsafe member. It also exists as a helper to get immediate overview over various platform compatibility issues.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.MemberType_PlatformSafe(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Windows Phone / Unity compatibility: Don't switch on MemberInfo.MemberType. It produced a strange exception when deployed to Windows Phone 8 using Unity 4.3.4: "Method not found: 'System.Reflection.MemberTypes". Use 'is PropertyInfo' and such or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.GetInterface_PlatformSafe(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: Type.GetInterface(string name) is not supported on Windows Phone 8. Use the overload 'Type.GetInterface(string name, bool ignoreCase)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XDocument,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: XDocument.Save(string fileName) does not exist on Windows Phone 8. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead. Beware that this overload simply saves the root node and does not the features unique to XDocument.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.String)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: XElement.Save(string fileName) does not exist on Windows Phone 8. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.Save_PlatformSafe(System.Xml.Linq.XElement,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Windows Phone 8 compatibility: XElement.Save(Stream) exists on Windows Phone 8, but not in .NET 3.5. Use 'XElement.Save(TextWriter)' or call this method instead.

member.name: M:JJ.Framework.PlatformCompatibility.PlatformExtensions.GetValue_PlatformSafe(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: iOS compatibility: PropertyInfo.GetValue in Mono on a generic type may cause JIT compilation, which is not supported by iOS. Use 'PropertyInfo.GetGetMethod().Invoke(object obj, params object[] parameters)' or call this method instead.
